title: (x) Serif / sans serif hybrid - Dead History {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone id this font? It was seen on some posters in the CompUSA stores at one time.

Thank you,  
scott penwell

[scottpenwell@mac.com](mailto:scottpenwell@mac.com)

| --- | --- |
| [sfont2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121232608/http:/typophile.com/files/sfont2.jpg) | 45.96 KB |

 [‹ (x) Information Twitology - Poster Bodoni {Nick Cotrell}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121232608/http:/typophile.com/node/17804 "Go to previous forum topic") [F.F.M.A - logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121232608/http:/typophile.com/node/17797 "Go to next forum topic")
author: scottpenwell

comments.content:
Figures — he’s the Original Glyph Guru, the Enlightened Identifier, the Heat Seeking Font Missile, the Character’s Character, the Terrifying Type Ninja.

_Of course he’s good!_ :^D

Psssst, it’s Stephen with an “e”...

Bonus points for who can tell me which typefaces this hybrid by [P. Scott Makela](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121232608/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P.%252BScott%252BMakela)’s is based on!

3... 2... 1... Go!
You can always count on Dav... :^)
